categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Keth was a male Human who was a Sith of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.
Keth first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Companion Customization vendor for the Empire on Taris.
